_comment: Stable Configuration - All values are optional, defaults shown below
_comment2: All time values are in ticks (20 ticks = 1 second)
_comment_max_animals: Maximum number of animals in a stable (including baby from breeding)
_comment_feed_required: Number of food items needed to feed each adult before breeding
_comment_growth_time: Time for baby animal to become adult (2400 = 2 minutes)
_comment_egg_production: Time between egg production for chickens (600 = 30 seconds)
_comment_max_eggs: Maximum eggs a chicken can produce in lifetime (after this they stop producing but are NOT killed)
_comment_milk_production: Time between milk production for cows/goats (1200 = 1 minute). Milk is renewable.
_comment_water_duration: How long water lasts after refilling (12000 = 10 minutes)
_comment_max_food: Maximum food capacity in the feeder
_comment_food_consumption: Ticks between food consumption when animals present (200 = 10 seconds)
_comment_feed_uses: Number of Animal Feed uses required to fill the feeder completely
_comment_adult_manure: Ticks between manure production for adult animals (200 = 10 seconds)
_comment_baby_manure: Ticks between manure production for baby animals (400 = 20 seconds)
_comment_manure_collect: Amount of manure needed to collect with shovel
_comment_bedding_decay: Ticks between bedding freshness decay (-1 per interval) (72000 = 1 hour)
_comment_bedding_freshness: Initial freshness when placing fresh straw (0-100)
